question: Which statement is true about customer Return Materials Authorization (RMA) transactions?
options: A Standalone RMA always generates a Credit Memo when refunded.
Users can create a Cash Refund from the RMA.
A Refund or Credit button appears on the RMA record, depending on the RMA form type.
Every RMA is a posting transaction.

question: Where can users find settings to optimize NetSuite performance?
Which statement explains why an inactive classification still appears in Financial Reports?
options: The accounting preference Include Inactive Classifications is checked.
Inactive classifications still appear to provide historical reporting and to avoid unbalanced totals.
The Administrator customized the report using the Financial Report Builder to include the inactive classification
Inactive classifications show, but with the identifier (Inactive).

question: Which statement is true for SuitePromotions?
options: Start and End dates are mandatory for Promotions.
Users can edit an existing Promotion to change the Coupon Code Type from Multiple Uses to Single Use.
Administrators must enable the Auto-Apply Promotions feature before using SuitePromotions.
Restrictions set on the Usage Limits subtab apply to multi-use coupon codes only.

question: Which statement is true about NetSuite support cases?
options: Users can check the status of a support case by clicking See Support Cases in the NetSuite Account Center.
Users must provide their login credentials to receive faster resolution from the support team.
Users can manually set the status of a case to Closed if their concern is resolved internally.
Case message history is available for up to 60 days when using the NetSuite Account Center role.

question: When setting Customer Statuses under Setup > Sales, what is the default Probability percent for new Lead records?
Which keyboard shortcut is supported when navigating the NetSuite environment?
options: In transaction headers, press enter to save the transaction.
When viewing reports, press up arrow to go to the first page of a report.
Press and hold Alt, and click with your mouse to select multiple choices in a list.
In date fields, press left arrow to enter yesterday's date.

question: Where in NetSuite can a user apply a vendor credit to an existing bill? (Choose 2.)
What does a padlock icon indicate on a custom field configuration page?
options: The custom field cannot be applied to custom forms.
The custom field type cannot be modified.
The custom field is a transaction body field.

question: Which permission on the Customer record Sales subtab gives Custom Role access to the Transaction sublist?
Which record types support the Multiple Currency feature? (Choose 2.)
Which feature allows users to manage inventory in various locations?
Which statement is correct about renaming records/transactions?
options: The navigational path to the record updates with the renaming.
Abbreviations for Transaction Names can only contain up to 10 alphanumeric and/or special characters.
Abbreviations for Account Type Names can be used to access the account when recording journal entries.
The renaming process applies to each language used within the system.

question: Which steps are needed to disable the Multi-Subsidiary Customer feature? (Choose 2.)
options: Reverse or delete all transactions related to customers and their secondary subsidiaries.
Inactivate Customer records with multiple transactions on different subsidiaries.
Remove all secondary subsidiaries from Customer records.
Set only one primary subsidiary and one secondary subsidiary in the Customer record.

question: Which is considered the primary classification used to organize records in a NetSuite OneWorld account?
Which field type can be used to track Employee birthdays?
Which statement is true about custom forms?
options: Even if a custom form is stored with a record, a user cannot access the form if it is not enabled for their role.
If you set preferred forms without restricting them, employees can still change the form when entering records.
The Store Form with Record option is available for all custom entry and custom transaction forms.
Define preferred forms from Home > Set Preferences.

question: Which statement is correct regarding Custom Transactions?
options: Custom Transaction Types can have auto-generated document numbers.
Custom Transaction Types cannot be imported via CSV.
Users can only create one custom form for each transaction type.
Custom Transaction Types cannot include Custom Transaction body fields.

question: What customization feature allows users with no scripting knowledge to modify standard NetSuite processes?
Where can users set a Default Role upon logging into NetSuite?
options: On the Employee record > Access tab, mark the Default checkbox next to the assigned role.
On the Choose Role page, mark the Default checkbox next to the assigned role.
On the Home page, click the star icon below the Oracle NetSuite logo.
On the Role record > Users tab, mark the Default checkbox next to the assigned user.

question: Where do users access NetSuite Performance Details?
options: Double-click the User Role dropdown menu.
Set up the Key Performance Indicators portlet.

question: While editing a cash sale, a user must refresh the record to see the latest email received from the customer. What must the user also do to see the email without losing unsaved data on the cash sale?
options: Go to the Communication subtab and click Refresh on the Messages sublist.
Right-click the Refresh icon on the browser and click Soft Refresh.

question: Where in NetSuite can a user find the Show Internal IDs preference?
Which restrictions can apply to records on the Home > Set Preferences > Restrict View tab? (Choose 2.)
A user created a List of Items Sold Today report using a saved search. Which portlet allows the user to add this report to the Home dashboard?
Which Documents > Mail Merge > Bulk Merge option is available for users to create bulk communications?
Which statement is true about restricting files in the File Cabinet?
options: To make files available to company users only, select the Company-Wide Usage box on the file record.
NetSuite allows users to restrict individual files.
The Available Without Login preference is selected by default.
If a parent folder's restriction changes after a subfolder is created, the subfolder inherits the new restriction.

question: Where should a user go to set a default expiration (in days) for Estimate records?
Which statements are true when converting Leads? (Choose 2.)
options: A Lead record can be converted to the Customer stage without creating a sales order transaction.
Leads converted to Customers can never be converted back to Leads.
When an Opportunity is created, the Lead record follows the status of the Opportunity record.
Leads can be converted to the Customer stage through a Relationships type CSV import.

question: What is the customer status after creating an Estimate for a Lead record?
Which can be set by users under Setup > Sales > Sales Preferences > Forecasts? (Choose 2.)
options: Allow Setting Probability in Forecast Editor
Allow Override of Quotas in Forecast Editor

question: Where can users set subsidiary-level support preferences?
Which role or roles can edit locked cases?
options: Administrator, Support Administrator, and Support Manager
Administrator and roles with Full access on Cases

question: What is the purpose of selecting Unsubscribed to Marketing by Default, under Marketing Preferences?
options: To enable the Global Subscription Status field on the Customer record.
To set the Global Subscription Status to Soft Opt-out once a new Customer record is created.
Existing customers are updated from Soft Opt-in to Unsubscribed.
To enable the Campaign Subscription Center link under Home > Dashboard >Settings portlet.

question: Using the Standard Sales Order Form, what transaction is created when billing a Sales Order that has a Payment Method selected?
Which preference allows users to enter a quantity higher than the quantity committed for an item on an Item Fulfillment form?
Which of these Customer Payment Methods are supported in NetSuite?
options: Credit Card Processing for Sales Orders

question: Which transaction is created when clicking Refund in a Return Materials Authorization (RMA) record?
Which statement is true about Customer Return Authorization records?
options: If created with a Credit Form, the record generates a Customer Deposit.
If created with a Credit Form, the record generates a Credit Memo.
If created with a Cash Form, the record generates a Credit Memo.
If created with a Cash Form, the record generates a Cash Sale.

question: Which item types may be used to cluster Item records and group them into one unit? (Choose 2.)
Which setting changes the quantity and value of an inventory item without entering a purchase order?
Which feature enables users to define various units used to stock, purchase, and sell inventory items and to track non-monetary accounts?
Which statement is true regarding Price Levels?
options: When the Multiple Prices feature is enabled, users can create up to 1,000 Price Levels.
Users can only enter a discount percentage on Price Levels.
Users are not allowed to inactivate a Price Level when it has a discount/mark-up percentage.
Price Levels cannot have the same discount/mark-up percentage.

question: Which accounting preference allows invoices to include memos on Time records when the Bill Costs for Customers feature is enabled?
Which statement is true regarding the Standard Purchase Order Approval Routing process?
options: A Purchase Request is automatically routed to the Supervisor if the Purchase Approver is unable to approve the transaction within 24 hours.
If the Purchase Limit of the employee is set to zero, then all Purchase Requests are automatically approved, even if a Purchase Approver is set.
A rejected Purchase Request can still be edited and resubmitted for approval.
A Purchase Request can no longer be edited once it has been approved.

question: At which status does a Vendor Bill affect Accounts Payable?
Which value can users enter in Global Search to include inactive records?
When added to the Criteria subtab of a Transaction search, which filter displays primary line data rows only?
options: Item on Any Line = specify item

question: Which statement is true about portlets?
options: Portlet controls are shown by default but can be hidden by the user.
Portlets with content that is calculated from current data includes an Export function.
All portlets can be expanded to full-screen view.
A pop-up may display, suggesting that portlets can be minimized to speed up dashboard loading time.

question: Which statement is true about Mass Updates?
options: A Mass Update definition must be saved before users can click Perform Update.
The first step to perform a Mass Update is to define new values that will be reflected on records.
On the Mass Update Preview Results page, users can exclude individual records.
Saved Mass Updates can be found on the list of Saved Searches.

question: Which resources under the Support tab can a user access to submit a case?
Which is a channel for contacting NetSuite CustomerSupport?
options: Submit a Support Ticket using the Employee Center role.
Start a Live Chat conversation at the NetSuite Visitor home page.
Email a NetSuite Customer Support representative directly.
Submit an Online Case via SuiteAnswers.

question: What can users find in SuiteAnswers, the NetSuite self-service support site?
options: The user account's File Cabinet usage

question: Which functionality is disabled in the Release Preview account?

Don and Mark both have the Consultant role. The role has the Create permission for Opportunities. Under the Global Permissions subtab of his Employee record, Don is provisioned Edit permission for Opportunities. Which statement is true?
options: They can both edit Opportunity records.
Mark can create Opportunity records while Don can edit and create Opportunity records.
Don can create Opportunity records while Mark can edit and create Opportunity records.
Neither Don nor Mark can edit Opportunity records.

question: Which attribute cannot be modified when editing a custom role?
Which standard NetSuite role is set up with mandatory Two-Factor Authentication?
When is a user asked to answer a security question before they can log in to NetSuite?
options: When the user provides an incorrect password upon initial login.
If the user logs in using a role with two-factor authentication enabled.
When a user proactively changes their password.
If the user attempts to log in using a new computer.

question: What settings can users change by clicking Set Preferences from the Settings portlet?
Where can you find logged OLD and NEW GL Impact of some transaction?
Which portlet shows a graphical representation of Key Performance Indicator (KPI) data?
Which statement is true about customer credit memos and inventory items?
options: A credit memo created from a return authorization has no impact on inventory, however, a stand-alone credit memo does impact inventory.
A credit memo created from a return authorization reduces inventory quantity.
A credit memo created from a return authorization impacts inventory, while a stand-alone credit memo does not impact inventory.
A stand-alone credit memo reduces inventory quantity.

question: Which source can automatically create Lead records?

Which portlet displays summary data from reports or Saved Searches for selected date ranges, with options to show comparisons between date ranges and to highlight results not meeting defined thresholds?
Which statement is true about access levels for NetSuite permissions?
options: The Create access level allows editing records.
The Edit access level does not allow deleting records.
The Partial access level allows editing but not creating records.
The View access level does not allow printing records.

question: Which feature enables users to invoice customers for time, items, and reimbursable expenses incurred?
Which URL accesses the release Preview Environment?
Which Select All checkbox under the Audience subtab defaults to checked when a Saved Search is set to Public?
Which statement is true about the Multi-Location Inventory feature?
options: Multi-Location Inventory only works for regular inventory items.
All Purchase Orders and Sales Orders should have a status of Fully Billed before enabling Multi-Location Inventory.
Quantity on Hand must have a zero value before enabling Multi-Location Inventory.
Inventory Distribution is required to move the quantity to locations after enabling Multi-Location Inventory.

question: What Subsidiary type is used to eliminate revenue and expenses at the consolidated level, removing the effect of transactions between subsidiaries?
Which two can users rename on the Rename Records/Transactions page? (Choose two.)
Which feature provides information about a specific field and can be accessed while ending or viewing a record? The Internal ID of the field can also be seen here.
How can an Administrator access open case tickets submitted to NetSuite Support by another user?
options: Using the Administrator role, navigate to Lists > Support > Cases.
In Suite Answers, below the Contact Support Online button, click the Open Cases link.
Access the Help Center and search for Case Tickets.
Click the NetSuite Account Center portlet link in the Support tab.

question: On which custom object can an Administrator disable system notes?
Which statement is true about NetSuite sessions?
options: Administrators can configure the Idle Session Timeout per user, on the user's Employee record.
The absolute NetSuite user interface session timeout is 180 minutes.
A warning with a 180-second countdown shows before an idle session timeout occurs.
Due to session synchronization, logging out of one tab ends the session for all other tabs in the same account.

question: Which feature allows customers to view an online transaction history, get quotes, and make payments within NetSuite?
Which statements describe the behavior for assigning territories to cases? (Choose two.)
options: Setting the Default Round-Robin territory to Inactive marks unmatched cases as Unassigned.
The Default Round-Robin territory always has last priority.
Re-assigning existing cases to case territories is not allowed.
NetSuite assigns cases to the best match after reviewing all case territories.

question: How can a standard field be moved to a different subtab on a custom form?
options: Go to Customization > Forms > Subtabs, then drag and drop the subtabs.
Edit the field setup and then change the value of the Subtab field under the Display subtab.
Edit the record and then drag and drop the standard field to the desired subtab.
Customize a form and click Move Elements Between Subtabs.

question: When using the Global Search to find records, how can users display inactive records in the search results?
options: Re-activate the record so that it appears in the Global Search results set.
Change the Display Type on the record.
Prefix the search keyword with the correct record type (for example, 'cu' for Customer).
Enable the user preference Include Inactives In Global & Quick Search.

question: Which transaction will have a GL impact on Accounts Payable?
Which feature enables users to create custom classifications in NetSuite?
Which preference allows users to see the Field ID in the Field Level Help?
Which statement is true about Custom Roles?
options: It is not possible to change the Center Type of created Custom Roles.
Grant employees access from the Users subtab of a Custom Role record.
Custom Roles can be created through CSV Import.
It is not possible to make copies of a Custom Role.

question: When creating Item records, which item type does not require setting up an Income Account?
Which statement is true about dashboards?
options: Use drag and drop to move portlets between NetSuite dashboards.
Portlet controls on dashboards are hidden, unless in full-screen view.
Only Administrators can arrange portlets on users' dashboards.
NetSuite Home page content depends on user roles.

question: Which statement is true about Two-Factor Authentication?
options: The user must enter a verification code that is sent to their email address every time they log in.
The duration of the trusted device can only be set to Per Session.
Two-Factor Authentication is required for highly privileged NetSuite roles (e.g., Sales Administrator).
Users need separate Two-Factor Authentication setups for each account.

question: Using a standard approval process for a Purchase Request, where do you set the Purchase Approver?
When creating a new Employee record, a user is unable to change the value in the Job Title field. What could be the cause?
options: The field is set to Inactive.
Field Display Type is set to Inline on the custom form.

question: An AP Clerk needs to pay multiple vendors but encounters an unexpected error after navigating to the Pay Bills page. The alternate solution is to use the Pay Single Vendor page, but this requires a great deal of time to pay the company's vendors. What is the appropriate NetSuite Case Severity Level the user should select when submitting a Support Case?
options: C4 — Enhancement I Non Tech Support

question: Which statement is true when using popup and dropdown lists in NetSuite?
options: Enter # in the Maximum Entries in Dropdowns field to always use popup lists.
To quickly enter a single value in a MultiSelect Popup List, type the first few letters of the value and press Tab.
Enter the record prefix followed by the first letters of a value to automatically populate a dropdown list.
When the Popup Auto Suggest preference is enabled, NetSuite suggests matching records after typing five (5) or more characters.

question: Which transaction reduces the quantity on hand of an inventory item?
Which statement is true about customer credit memos and inventory items?
options: A credit memo created from a return authorization has no impact on inventory, however, a stand-alone credit memo does impact inventory.
A credit memo created from a return authorization reduces inventory quantity.
A credit memo created from a return authorization impacts inventory, while a stand-alone credit memo does not impact inventory.
A stand-alone credit memo reduces inventory quantity.

question: Which statement is true about using Quick Accept in Event records?
options: Quick Accept can be performed through the Calendar portlet.
Enable the Quick Accept preference under Setup > Activities > Calendar Preferences.
The Event record should be in Edit mode to perform Quick Accept.
The Quick Accept button provides users an option to mark events as Tentative or Accepted.

question: An Administrator renamed the Customer record type to Client and you would like to search for a customer named Acme Inc. Which keywords would you enter in a Global Search? (Choose two.)
What Subscription Status should the Administrator select so that customers receive email campaigns?
Maya is using a custom role that has the Import CSV File permission. On the Import Options page of the CSV Import Assistant, Maya can only select Data Handling of Add. What is the reason for this?
options: The custom role has the Edit level permission for the record type she is importing.
The custom role’s permission level for Import CSV File is not set to Full.
The custom role has the Create permission level for the record type she is importing.
The custom role’s permission level for Import CSV File is set to Create.
